notes.text: So this grind was really hard I kept on bricking even with Restart and the 1 time I didn't double brink I would go first and lose to a prefection play/hand this deck is KOG worthy mayby not my one but CA is really good but 100% NOT OVERPOWERED! This deck is good yes and has a lot of plays and great monsters but it biggest weak point is that every deck that is played has some sort of way to counter you think about econ every deck in this game plays econ or it has to be a special deck that has like massive morph or flood hole trap  thing. Don't give up on this deck yet go and wait for the new banlist etc to see what their plans are for this deck/archtype
